data.text: @DomPost Weird leading with a picture of Kirk. His questions have been answered. Quite simple really.

@DomPost Is it on the front page of your paper?

Are Ukrainian people more important than people of your own country?

People who have lost jobs, businesses, health and life due to mandates?

C'mon don't try troll with a low IQ tweet DP.

You are paid to do this. 

Try harder.

Do better.
